title.rendered: Flyernest Airlines Head Office: Ticket Booking and Fleet

content.rendered:
Ernest Airlines (registered as Ernest S.p.A) is an Italian low-cost airline, headquartered in Milan. The airline operates a fleet of Airbus A320 family aircraft to over 15 destinations. The airline operates with its main hub at Milan – Malpensa Airport.

 

 

 

Booking

Phone : IT : +39 02 897 30 660
AL : +355 (0)44 810 810
UA : +380 44 594 5838

Business hours : 6:00 – 22:00 / Mon-Sun CET

Email id : booking@flyernest.com

Complaints : customercare@flyernest.com

Lost or Damaged luggage : lostandfound@flyernest.com

Call Center: refunds@flyernest.com or customercare@flyernest.com (Ticket refund or for any queries)

Flyernest Airlines Official website :  https://flyernest.com/en

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Flyernest Airlines

  • Airbus A319
  • Airbus A320
  • Airbus A321
  • Boeing 737

Flyernest Airlines Baggage Allowance

Flyernest Airlines Baggage Allowance

View Flyernest Airlines Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Special Assistance in Flyernest Airlines

Travelling in Flyernest while pregnant : 

Expectant mother can travel in Flyernest with no documents up to the 31st week of pregnancy. From the 32nd to the 35th completed week of pregnancy a medical certificate is required. Beyond the 36th week of pregnancy the future mother is considered unacceptable for air travel.

Travelling with Pet in Flyernest Airlines :

For more details visit : https://flyernest.com/en/help-center/faq/pets-on-board/

Queries handled by Flyernest Airlines Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries.

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Flyernest Airlines Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Flyernest Airlines : (click on the stars below)
